text: But don't judge it by its look,
Even if it was my choice,

Some say randomness is a psychological disorder. I just say it is simply imaginationâ€™s way of telling you to stop keeping him inside and let him run wild. It is the ability to say one word, linking it to a word which is linked to another word and it goes on until a word which has no direct meaning is formed. The order in chaos.

If I were to say pool, I could say computer. That is because pool is like billiards and it has an eight ball which shows you an outlook which is also a program for the computer. I do wonder if it is possible to find something not linked. I guess not though. Bananas contain lots of potassium.
